title: Bleeding Senses
key_events: Synesthesia begins - colors have sound, sounds have texture
Adrian and Marcus discuss orange juice humming, eggs smelling purple
Patel navigates by sound with eyes closed
Chen experiencing time as visible dimension
Morning walk where light becomes too loud for Marcus
Dr. Okonkwo offers medication, Adrian refuses to delay adaptation
Adrian experiences sensory chaos in his room, self dissolving

character_development.Adrian: Entering Stage 2, senses bleeding together, choosing conscious transformation over dampening, self-coherence fragmenting
character_development.Marcus: Also entering Stage 2, philosophical about beauty and horror, hiding from overwhelming light

planted_elements: Different manifestations of synesthesia across individuals
The choice to adapt consciously rather than medicate
transformation_stage: Stage 1 to Stage 2 transition - synesthesia manifesting, sensory boundaries dissolving, self-coherence fragmenting
cosmic_horror_elements: Senses bleeding together as brain restructuring
The impossibility of evaluating transformation from inside it
Boundaries between self and world blurring
